Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm Thomas. I've played KSP for some time now. First I used demo, then today I finally bought it!

I'm also big fan of video games. My favourite series are Mass Effect, Portal, Half Life...

I'm not a big fan of movies, however I watched few intresting ones including Inception or Project X. I also love The Walking Dead.

There are few ontresting books in my collection. I bought most of them because of their connections to my favourite game series. That's why I have for example all Mass Effect books or Metro 2033.

And since no one really cares about that, I'm done with writing about myself. See you on the Mun

Edited May 21, 2013 by Rich

Welcome to the forums!

I've always been a massive science fiction fan myself. I got my start reading a lot of my dad's old novels and short stories. Often when I should have been doing homework, but let's not discuss that... KSP is like a dream come true for me as well; the only thing better would be to actually go into space someday.

If you ever run into something you're having trouble with, or if you just want to get better at the game than you already are, don't hesitate to check out the Tutorials section, especially the Drawing Board (link in my sig). The people in the How To section will also do their best to answer any questions you might have.

Happy landings!
You mentioned that you like Portal. You have instantly gained respect from an experienced kerbonaut. Good job, sir
